actions.text: Committee on Finance ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Dole. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without recommendation without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 995.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 303(a) and section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 for consideration of H.R. 6211, the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1982, and certain amendments thereto.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 6211 (surface transportation assistance).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 303(a) and section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 for consideration of H.R. 6211, the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1982, and certain amendments thereto.
